SEARCH
Package battleship

Class View

java.lang.Object
battleship.View
All Implemented Interfaces:
GraphicalInterface
public class View extends Object implements GraphicalInterface
The View class represents the graphical user interface of the Battleship game. It implements the GraphicalInterface interface.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    View()
    Constructs a View object and initializes the graphical user interface.
